attributes.action: stop the proposed plans at st john lloyd catholic school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Sir ,please can you stop the plans to reduce space our children have to learn ,our local council are trying to put 3 schools together in place where st john lloyd catholic school ,Trowbridge ,Cardiff,S.WALES presently stands .

rejection.details: You should approach the Welsh Assembly directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
